actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1121.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6811 to provide for increased United States participation in the International Development Association, to provide for United States participation in the African Development Bank, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6811 (United States participation in the International Development Association and the African Development Bank).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6811 to provide for increased United States participation in the International Development Association, to provide for United States participation in the African Development Bank, and for other purposes.
